body:
Watch me die multiple times on the walls.  http://youtu.be/3lJnvD8e3so
Maybe you're in it? locky, rilo, porc, gab, caleb, nate, polar, paul, trevor, jj, cosmic, micah...
I even kill myself once by accident...

music: Once Again -Tristam
http://youtu.be/59M5z0c8YtE

title: Walls Video - Death Montage

replies.body:
So...some players were asking me why I only showed my deaths in the video. When I record with fraps, my fps drops to 15 or so.  It's hard to win like that for me.  I do much better when I'm not recording. Next time, I will try to capture more wins!
Thanks for watching!

replies.body: This is a great idea for a video, murph :)
